s: ^Hi Lila! I'm doing well! I could use some- is that glitter?

Chat1: ^Lila?Smiling "The pre-school life is the life of one covered perpetually in glitter, yes. I'm one with the sparkle, now."

s: ^Well, I only know one thing about glitter...it travels. Should I be afraid?
^That sounds delightful. Hey, can I ask your help with something?

Chat2: ^Lila?Smiling "Well, you know this glitter will get all over you despite the fact we haven't hugged. I'd just accept it now if I were you. Besides, art is a great way to destress."

s: ^Really? I didn't know that. I thought glitter was the bane of all existence.
^Actually speaking of stress, I could use some advice.

Chat3: ^Lila?Smiling "Well, glitter does get everywhere, but yes I teach the children to use art to express themselves."
^Lila?Smiling "It's so important to keep stress levels down. Especially people of color or other marginalized identities."

s: ^That's really wonderful, maybe you can help me with some advice for a friend.
^Really? Maybe you can help me with some advice about stress?

Explain1: ^Lila?Smiling "Sure! Stress can be really difficult to handle. I suffer from a lot of stress, and you'd be surprised how it can hurt your health."

s: ^Well, that's just it. My friend may be experiencing racial stress.
^Is there such a thing as racial stress? I'm beginning to worry about a friend.

Explain2: ^Lila?Neutral "If your friend is a person of color, they aren't imagining it. Racial stress is real, and can actually cause post traumatic stress."
^Lila?Neutral "That can harm your heart, and lead to other health issues. It's serious."

s: ^Do you have any suggestions for them?
^That does sound serious. What can we do for them?

Suggestion1: ^Lila?Smiling "Well, your friend should talk to someone, and try to do self care activities they enjoy. They shouldn't be afraid to rest. Racial stress is serious and real."

Suggestion1.#: notification Lila_Day 2_Racial stress is real, and serious_Rashad2

Suggestion1: ^Lila_Day 2_Self care activities can help with stress

Suggestion1.#: notification Lila_Day 2_Self care activities can help with stress

s: ^Is that all? Is there anything they can do?

Suggestion2: ^Lila?Neutral "It's important that your friend see a mental health professional from their cultural background."
^Lila?Neutral "Sustained collective trauma and workplace microagressions can lead to mental health issues, trust me. It's called race based traumatic stress syndrome. RBTS."
^Lila_Day 2_Racial stress can lead to race based traumatic stress syndrome; RBTS_Rashad2

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 2_Racial stress can lead to race based traumatic stress syndrome; RBTS_Rashad2

Suggestion2: ^Lila_Day 2_RBTS can lead to mental health issues_Rashad2

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 2_RBTS can lead to mental health issues_Rashad2

Suggestion2: ^Lila_Day 2_Microagressions and sustained collective trauma can harm mental health_Rashad2

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 2_Microagressions and sustained collective trauma can harm mental health_Rashad2

Suggestion2: ^Lila_Day 2_See a therapist that understands RBTS preferably from their cultural background_Rashad2

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 2_See a therapist that understands RBTS preferably from their cultural background_Rashad2

s: ^That's very helpful, Lila. Do you know any other tips?
^That's wonderful advice, Lila. Thank you so much.

Goodbye: ^. I have the name of some therapists who specialize in racial stress, so if your friend needs a recommendation let me know okay?"
^Lila?Smiling "Now, I'm going to head off and get deglittered. See ya!"

s: ^Thanks so much, Lila! See you soon!
^Bye Lila! Good luck with the glitter.
